org.apache.james.imap.encode
Interface ImapResponseWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChannelImapResponseWriter, OutputStreamImapResponseWriter
public interface ImapResponseWriter

Writes IMAP response.

Factors out basic IMAP reponse writing operations from higher level ones.

Method Summary

          Closes a parenthesis - writes a ).

upperCaseAscii

void upperCaseAscii(java.lang.String message)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Writes given message converted to upper case. The message may be assumed to be ASCII encoded. Conversion of characters MUST NOT be performed according to the current locale but as per ASCII.

Parameters:
message - ASCII encoded, not null
Throws:
java.io.IOException

quoteUpperCaseAscii

void quoteUpperCaseAscii(java.lang.String message)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Writes given message converted to upper case. The message may be assumed to be ASCII encoded. Conversion of characters MUST NOT be performed according to the current locale but as per ASCII. The message is surrounded by quotes.

Parameters:
message - ASCII encoded, not null
Throws:
java.io.IOException
